website_summaries.verdict: A modern bistro set with a low table and comfy armed chairs. Better for relaxing than al fresco dining.
pros: This set can stay outside year-round without damage, though you will need to take the cushions indoors in wet weather
A highly comfortable set that's perfect for reading or sharing drinks in the garden
cons: Some buyers find the chairs too low to the ground

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, easy assembly and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the time it stated and it was super easy to assemble. Fits perfectly in my small balcony and now i can sit outside with my pups and enjoy the outdoors from home.
customer_reviews.author: Denia

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I believe for the price this set was worth the money. If you are looking for durability be prepared to spend >$500 for a comparable set. The time to assemble wasn't bad and the instructions were easy to understand (I'd recommend you watch the YouTube video 1st). Another piece of advice; do not tighten screws with allan key until you have put together the whole set. That way if you make a mistake you can quickly remove a screw. I wouldn't store this set outside either. Keep it in the garage or indoors when not in use and handle it very gently when sitting on it. The cushion isn't the best so you can purchase one for a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping and Easy to Put Together !
customer_reviews.text: I was sad at first that the shipping originally said it would take a week, but it ended up coming two days later! Very satisfied. Easy to put together but make sure you read the part of the instructions that says “DO NOT SCREW THE SCREWS IN ALL THE WAY UNTIL THE END.” I am very pleased, product was affordable, had fast shipping and easy to put together. All around perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Low Profile Patio Set! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time, with all parts and was assembled easily. They are very sturdy for a low profile patio set. We purchased them so they would not obstruct our view from inside. The seat cushion is thin, but very comfortable. The thin cushion makes it easy to store while not in use. Amazing value in this set!
customer_reviews.author: Zona

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set that I am getting good use out of. It is unique and great looking - you can't get something that looks like this at this price point - I looked everywhere! It is a bit annoying to put together and will take some time, but it comes together within a few hours and you only need an Allen wrench. All the pieces were not all included, so I needed a refunded. The seller was accommodating, so satisfactory customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great patio set
customer_reviews.text: Very chic and pretty easy to assemble. Took me about an hour and I didn't even need to watch the video just went off of the diagram. Instructions for the table were annoying because half of the pieces weren't labeled in the diagram and the label for the screws in the diagram were mixed up but it was easy to figure out. Can't wait until it warms up so I can actually enjoy it instead of staring at it all day!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahlizx3

customer_reviews.title: Good for price but I don’t like quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for the price. It is too light and the cushions too so they fly away with the wind. The material looks cheap but I guess that’s what you get when you don’t pay much for it
customer_reviews.author: Jimena Lautenslager

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set. I think we got a great deal on it. No issues or complaints. I was hesitant to get it for the lack of reviews but I’m glad I went with this one
customer_reviews.author: Amm1713

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my father as a gift. Delivery was on target. There was one table assembly piece missing along with a double of another. It happens, no biggie. I contacted the company in regards to the piece. They were quick to respond, friendly, and ready to send the missing part. Their customer service could not have been better in my opinion. The set is of good quality and my dad loves it! He loves it so much, we are patiently waiting for the set to become available again so he can have a second!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Oberdier

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after first usage
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed with this product. It is supposed to be weather resistant for outdoor patio use and after one evening of light rain rust was pouring out of all the metal, both table and chairs. I would not re omens this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: regina fath

customer_reviews.title: The plastic fasteners suck!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to assemble because the fasteners just broke or failed. Once put together it is a cute little set and works well in the area we placed it. It comes with black cushions so I will replace them, no one want to sit on black cushions on a hot day in Arizona. The cushions are thin so for comfort I would change them out.
customer_reviews.author: S.  Math

customer_reviews.title: They’re nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: These would be ok for a small covered balcony if you’re not very tall. I’m 6’4 and these chairs are small.. they are definitely not something you could sit in for very long. They look decent enough but I wouldn’t really say they’re a “quality” product. The cushions are thin and cheap and hold water after the rain. There’s also a couple weld spots that are already rusting. I went ahead and gave these away in Craigslist. Looks are deceiving and these look nice online but the reality is what you’d expect from some low quality Chinese steel frames, plastic and bolts. Long term durability is probably not very good.
customer_reviews.author: 1080p

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, some of the screw wholes were not lined up so I had to be creative with the putting the chairs together.
customer_reviews.author: Dagmara

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chair is not put together to hold any weight the back has screws that barley go in to frame some one could call backwards and hurt their neck the chair has 2 screws on each side in back and 1 screw in the front of Sent on each side some one could go threw chair and hurt back. And they are not for 5ft 11 inch people they are for short thin people.
customer_reviews.author: kathy Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled
customer_reviews.text: Sure, at first glance, this product seems like quite the bargain. Three piece patio furniture set for under $150? Like most things in life, if it seems too good to be true, it usually is. First, the product arrived without all necessary parts and pieces. You’d think after having shipped thousands of these the seller would have this simple process down pat. Second, if you live anywhere that has gusts of wind over 1mph, you can kiss your seat cushions goodbye. They’ll takeoff faster than a 747 never to be seen again. Third, good luck aligning parts to the appropriate holes. Save your money and buy one of the many more expensive, more reliable, and sturdier alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small patio and this set is perfect! It was easy to put together and sturdy. In some of the reviews I saw people were putting the seats on upside down....lol. I believe this is because when you get it the cushions are put in the bottom of the seat but that is so everything fits in the box when they ship it. That doesn't mean that is where they go..lol. Goodness people. You will see in the reviews people complain about them sinking in the chair....that is not how the chair should be put together. Anyway, I love mine! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hinzman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, minor defects in holes.
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty easy to put together although I had to first watch the video in order to make sure I understood which side to place each piece on. My only complaint is that on each chair, some of the already inserted holes were warped and so on one chair, I could not insert a screw in one of the holes and on the other chair, the hole wasn’t big enough to screw the nail completely. Ultimately, this is a pretty set and I think the chairs are sturdy enough despite those warped holes.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful and made of strong materials perfect for my balcony!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You sit too low, not a proper sitting height.
customer_reviews.text: More suitable for children. This set looks great in photos but is squaty and very low to the ground. If the chairs were 6 inches higher off the ground it wouldn’t look like children’s furniture. It’s okay for a appointment balcony but NOT for a home patio.
customer_reviews.author: ReroeMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fantastic little set! We have a 5 ft by 7 ft patio to work with in the city. I needed something small enough to fit but with room to stand and walk in or out also. This set fits the bill. Actual black I color- which is exactly what I wanted. Cushions included are comfy enough. Both husband and friends say the chair wouldn’t be as comfy if I didn’t add throw pillows, so those are definitely recommended. The glass table top sticks to the stand via suction cups, but it still slides it seems, so we may take some liquid nails and actually glue it down. Overall- very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Invest in something a little more durable
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice in the photos. Pain in the butt to assemble. Started falling apart within a few weeks (screws falling out from very little use on an apt balcony). You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received this set earlier than I was supposed to, which was nice. It took me about two hours to assemble by myself. I've been very happy with it so far. The cushions leave a bit to be desired, so I bought bigger ones from Lowe's and use the old cushions as a sort of back rest. The only other issue I've had is the glass trying to slip off the table. I can't seem to get the suction cups to grab on right. But as long as I'm not moving things around and rearranging as I frequently do, it's fine. I'd recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jody V.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful patio set but nightmare to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The patio set is beautiful but I am giving it 4 stars for two primary reasons. 1) The shipping was delayed by almost a week. The seller was kind enough to help out there but wanted to call that out. 2) Assembly takes a while and is hard with the small tools. I tried to use a larger screw driver but given the small areas it was not possible. Overall the product looks great. Awesome for small spaces! Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sheraz tariq

customer_reviews.title: Assembly in 30min
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought this because of the color it wasnt until it arrived tht I read the reviews cuz I had no idea I need to assemble this. Reading the reviews had me very nervous to even start but it actually was very easy. Did it in 30min with my husband no power tools everything was in the box no missing parts. I did listen to one reviewer tht said strt with the back 1st instead of the seat like it says in the instructions so idk if tht why it was so easy . And every thing lined up as well.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Nightmare.....good luck
customer_reviews.text: This set was a nightmare to assemble. The screw holes did not line up on the chairs. My husband had to make the holes a little larger with a drill so the screws would line up. The screws themselves were improperly threaded and the written instructions were awful. We have been putting furniture together for 40 years this was one of the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small patio. Very easy to assemble and all the holes line up and screws fit. Absolutely no problems, and it has no issue holding me, a 200 lbs man. The assembly instructions are terrible but you should be able to look at the holes and figure it out, there's only like 6 holes, not hard. Apparently there's a YouTube video that will detail it better (listed on the instructions). I never watched it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed pretty tedious to put together so I paid my 15 year old daughter $20 to do it. Took her a little under 2 hours... I gave her my Allen wrench ratchet tool half way through and that sped up the process. Chairs are low profile. Plenty sturdy and roomy for me... I’m 6’1’’ 245, so they should fit most people pretty well. The back is low so may not be the most comfy for an extended period, but ours are mostly decorative with occasional short term sitting so they fit the bill perfectly. They are very sharp looking in person.
customer_reviews.author: JVN

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: oh m y goodness, I cannot say enough good things about this patio set. The price is very affordable, but these chairs are excellent quality! They arrive in pieces, though it is very easy to put them together. In addition to that, they are very comfortable, and they do not look like they are cheaply made! If you're on the fence, definitely go for it! One of the best amazon finds yet!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to having outdoor space and this set is great. Nice look and very comfortable. We sit out on our balcony daily and the set makes us feel like grown ups. Nice to upgrade from our usual folding chair lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Eener

customer_reviews.title: Chic in classic black!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of these chairs and the size. They fit perfectly into my space. I loved the price for the two chairs and the facts that it came with a glass covered side table was a bonus!! The color was also important to me as these usually come in dark brown but the black color on this set really makes it more modern.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Nice porch accent for drinks and chips.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for outdoors and very solid and sturdy. Pretty easy to put together, just give yourself some time and a drink. The only thing I wish they added was a way to keep the pads from blowing off the chairs in the wind. We ended up sewing a little Velcro strip around the end of the pads to keep them on the chairs. Would easily purchase again
customer_reviews.author: DaveInBoston

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy patio furniture
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were easy to follow. It took a while to put together. One of the chairs and the table wobble a little but there are levelers on the bottom, which are working well for now. There are some areas with scratches and paint chipped off but hardly noticeable. It is a nice set and my dog also enjoys the chairs because they are just big enough for her to lay down on.
customer_reviews.author: mycorrhizae

customer_reviews.title: A Bargain
customer_reviews.text: This set is everything it advertised to be; attractive, sturdy and useful. Among the added surprises were the fact that I ordered on Thursday expecting arrival in a few days, it arrived on Friday morning and I had assembled the set by Friday afternoon without bleeding even once. I am enjoying my mornings, afternoons and evenings on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: juanandonlyish

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and close to the ground
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets for smaller deck. Very wobbly and uneven footing for chairs and table. Also sits very low to the ground, bad knees may have issues sitting and standing. I guess for $132, what did I expect?
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for small space
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for small space. I put it together by myself in about 45 minutes. Easy to assemble, all holes lined up correctly. Instructions easy to understand. Nice set & looks nice on my front porch. The seat cushions are kinda thin but they will work for now, I’ll add some back pillows to accent the set. The table is a nice touch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kianna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame it very low quality cushions
customer_reviews.text: The frame of the chairs are really nice and sturdy and so is the table. However the cushion covers are incredibly low quality. The covers looked really nice but when I removed them to wash I saw the really poor quality stitching. There were so many loose threads. If you pulled them it was like unraveling a knit sweater!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Too low / somewhat uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are sturdy, but very low to the ground. I'm 5'8 and my boyfriend is 5'10 and we both sink into these chairs - but not in a comfortable way. The back doesn't go far up, so I don't feel supported. They were easy to assemble, and look nice. The table is chic, but also low to the ground. I did a lot of research on patio furniture (which is shockingly expensive). I wish I would have given more thought to height and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: MarsVars

customer_reviews.title: Nice but the assemble is a pain.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Love the material and serves as my apartment balcony set but the assembly is a pain. Screws do not align with holes, so you have to force the screws a certain way. It would be an easy assemble if holes and screws lined up. Took me a while. Overall quick delivery and nice set once put together. I am very pleased. Might I add, the customer service was phenomenal. Quick response and very accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about a year now and they are really good quality. The set up wasn’t too bad and the instructions were clear. It’s rained a bunch here and they also sat in the sun for most of the time until I got an umbrella, they have held up really well. The cushions are the only con with these, they faded fairly quickly and weren’t comfortable so I purchased me own set.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice, super easy to assemble, great product
customer_reviews.text: I won’t lie I had complications at first with a screw that came wrong. I understand things happen so I contacted the seller and told them the issue and they fixed the problem immediately. A wonderful product and great customer service. You WILL NOT be disappointed in this buy! Super easy to put together and fits great on a small balacony or porch ! Buy Buy Buy
customer_reviews.author: Autumn.

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with this purchase. They're on the cheaper side compared to a lot of outdoor furniture and you get what you pay for. The cushions are ok but sorta thin so I'll probably replace them eventually, but the chairs themselves are sturdy. The glass on the table sorta suctions onto the legs so if it gets bumped it will move a bit but no serious issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for $115. We had a problem getting the screws in some of the holes because they aren't lined up correctly. There's a small scratch on the glass table and the glass doesn't stay on well. The table might not make it long around here with 2 small kids. Over all I'm happy with it but only because it's a pretty cheap set and free shipping. I wouldn't be happy if I had paid more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a surprise gift for my mentee. She is a young person who would sit on her rear porch to enjoy a cigar. Now she can enjoy just sitting out there to enjoy the fresh air too. The set is durable, but not heavy. It’s not bulky so it’s easy to move. It’s sturdy and comfortable. It even looks fine inside. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The product is good and it looks good on my patio however the instructions dont make sense and the only reason i didnt give it 5 stars is because the assembly is hard and the pillows are on the cheap side. SUGGESTION: ATTACH THE BACK AS YOU ATTACH THE SIDES. One at a time. YOU WILL NEED TO ADJUST IT TO FIT PROPERLY.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gorbach

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to decorate my patio and quarantine seemed like the perfect time. Love this set. It's simple, clean, and looks expensive but at a reasonable cost. Some of the chairs were difficult to assemble in terms of lining up the holes properly. I did have to unscrew a couple pieces because it wasn't 100% clear which direction things were facing in the picture. Otherwise relatively easy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing.  Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It looks great on my patio. It’s surprisingly very comfortable. It sits lower to ground which I like as I am 5’3. My only complaint is the table top doesn’t stay on very well. It has suction cups to hold glass piece down, only one seems to “stick”. You just have to be careful not to bump it. Other than that I would highly recommend set.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Munchkin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I can sit outside on the deck. I love the look of it and the sturdiness. The directions are a little weird, we started out following them but when we went to attach the back of the chair it didn’t fit. We ended up attaching the back to the bars first and boom! Everything fit great and it all came together perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Calvo

customer_reviews.title: A pain to put together but wonderful once assembled
customer_reviews.text: I'm not horrible at assembling things, but I really struggled with putting these chairs together. The holes are kinda hard to match up, but an entire patio set for $125? It's worth the struggle. Nice looking quality, pretty comfortable. Read the dimensions though. These chairs sit really low which I really like the look of but if you have a high balcony with a good view, you might want something that sits higher.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rose Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Some positive but many negatives.
customer_reviews.text: The construction of the chairs appears sturdy. The fabric has faded in less than a couple months. The instruction manual is difficult to follow and many errors. Some parts missing while another order had additional parts. I would not recommend these chairs/tables.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thin metal tubing paints peeling off after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Look good, soft to sit in. Metal tubing it’s made of is thin...DONT drop on hard surface or you will bend your chair. After 1 month of sitting outdoors in northern Michigan summer paints already flaking off. Gave as gift ...should have saved my money on this lightweight furniture.
customer_reviews.author: sheylal

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This set is fine. Sorta small and feels like office furniture outside on my porch. Having said that I kept it because it was inexpensive and gives me a place to sit. It’s not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Missing drilled hole, scratched
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but one of the seats did not have the correct number of holes drilled for the screws (1 hole instead of 2!). It seems ok for now but worried about durability. It seemed to be packaged well but one of the sides is extremely scratched. Of I course I noticed these issues after I had already but the other pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this cute little patio set we used it for our front door porch very good quality and easy to assemble got the little mat to go with the set!!
customer_reviews.author: Cintia Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Weathers the elements well
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fine. Boxes came fine. Lots of parts. Almost like an IKEA furniture assembly. Just have patience. The set looks great! Just what we wanted. Matches our from area. It is sturdy and weathers the rain just fine. Had many compliments on it. I do recommend
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together by myself. Took about 30 mins maybe. The seat cushions aren’t thick but it being rattan it works. They seem like they sit low actually a really good height easy to get in and out of. At this price I will buy another set do you have a four seater
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bowers

customer_reviews.title: 1 Issue
customer_reviews.text: The big problem was they had staples blocking the holes I needed to put screws in. Once I figured that out and finished struggle of pulling staples out . All was fine
customer_reviews.author: Sanford P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for patios
customer_reviews.text: We live in an apartment so finding patio furniture that fits can be difficult. We also don’t have an overhead so finding furniture with removable cushions and weatherproof base was a must. So far these are durable, cushions are comfortable, and was so easy to assemble. Nice thing about the size is also that you can switch out your own cushions to add your own style
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love how they look on my patio
customer_reviews.text: The assembling part was a bit tricky, as some of the holes for the nails aren't aligned well together. Took some time to put them together (need some force and patience to put the nails). But the end result turns out well! Love the small coffee table. the chairs are sturdy and comfortable too
customer_reviews.author: EstherN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set!!! Minor flaws when putting Table together. (Holes at top don’t align)
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful and simple to assemble, but takes a bit of work to correctly put it together. Perfect for my apartment Balcony. I would have given this 5 stars, however the top piece to my table does not fully align with the holes on the side pieces. (See difference in pictures) This prevents the glass to stick to the suction cups in order to stay, which means the glass for the table slides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The hex key supplied to tighten screws is hard to use so used my own. Went together fine other than that. If you need detailed instructions you wont find them here. If you're handy, that won't be a problem. I'll plan to replace the cushions next season because the ones that come with are pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The chairs came packaged well & was easy to unbox. I assembled in a little over a hour by myself. It’s shorter than I thought it would be but it’s cute and sturdy. I don’t plan on sitting on it much so, it’s decent for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cris B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small Patio!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Fits perfectly on my Downtown apartment patio. Great price and seems sturdy so far. Making quarantine a little easier by being able to sit outside!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Braden

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set Once It's Assembled
customer_reviews.text: This set is nice and a good value for the money, but it's not easy to assemble. Need two people, nothing aligns very well, and the directions are off a bit. But once assembled, it looks good in the patio and the chairs are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rickshore

customer_reviews.title: Black and IVORY not black and white
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE TO REVIEW: Wonderful company to work with, they listened to my concerns and addressed the issues in a timely manner. Very happy with customer service. The cushions looked aged and weathered with more of a yellow color vs white. Comfortable for the price, but disappointed it is not correctly described. White shirt next to cushion for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great for a patio/balcony
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets for my patio and paired them with a firepit. It was perfect for my patio. The set was a little tricky to put together based on the size of the parts and the screws. The Allen Wrench that came with it has a ball on the end that was good for the angles. The set looks so good though and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonell Finley

customer_reviews.title: Get more than what you paid for this patio set!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as a housewarming gift for my niece and she absolutely loves it. It's the perfect fit for her small balcony, very sturdy, easy to assemble and it looks really rich. The construction and quality are stellar!
customer_reviews.author: GINGER 330

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with this outdoor set. Everything was easy to put together, except we had a little trouble getting the backs of the chairs on, but overall worth the little frustration. You can’t beat these for the price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: swillis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Second order came with an issue on the chairs. They contacted me to let me know they were aware of the problem, and replaced de chairs free of charge. Great product for its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Lower to the ground tha I expected but good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, light weight comfortable patio set
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my new patio furniture set. I was actually surprised that set is a Good quality and cost only $200 for 2 chairs and the side table. Highly recommend for those who wants to add couple comfy chairs to their back yard, patio or pool area.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I agree with those who said don't tighten the screws until all pieces are attached.
customer_reviews.text: This is a stylish seating set for small spaces. Living in FL we spend a lot of time outside on the lanai. I added colorful back cushions for comfort and a splash of color.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E.

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great outside furniture with great price. Took an hour to put together. Reading reviews was a little scared on putting it together. Really simple. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comfortable, looks great, and more than I expected for the cost. Cons: some pieces are hard to screw in and I couldn’t get them in all the way. The table top is not flush, so any time you put a glass on it, it rattles or moves.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Went together very easily and look great on my porch. They fit in my space perfectly. Cushions are comfortable and when they get wet they don’t really hold water. Just flip it over and you’re good to go
customer_reviews.author: Matt Giorgianni

customer_reviews.title: Overall Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs. The welding feels sturdy, the finish is great, and overall happy. I did have to drill a couple holes to make them wider though because they weren't lining up properly on one of the chairs. As of about a month later, they still show no sign of fading from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: monicaxscarlett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was an excellent choice getting this set. Easy to put together, great quality and specially the price!!! Looks great! its the perfect size for my balcony. Very comfortable and stylish. I am quite pleased with my purchase Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great patio set
customer_reviews.text: The patio set is very nice and easy to build. It's comfortable and attractive. We did have two pieces that came in defective. We communicated with the company and received a response quickly and recieved the correct pieces quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ana pineda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a smaller bistro set for my front porch and this was perfect. It arrived WAY earlier than expected and was not difficult to put together. It gives my front porch an updated and modern look. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jillpill

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as Christmas gift for the in laws for the patio of their apartment. Very easy to assemble, look nice and she was so happy with the set as it looks very stylish and fits perfect on her patio
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: bad buy, rusting after 48hrs
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase. All four arms of the chairs starting showing rust within 48hrs of assembly. Contacted the seller and they offered to send me replacement arms to reassemble, but they would take over a month to get shipped to me. The only other option they offered was a $40 refund bad buy .. I don't usually post rants but I feel robbed of my money. -SJ
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's too small, like a toy....it seems to be for children. Do not buy this furniture it is priceless
customer_reviews.author: ANTONIO CAVALCANTI

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than it looks in picture...but excellent patio set
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with the purchase. Good set for the price...
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: This set arrived early, easy to put together and very comfortable,great price to. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that doesn't have a lot of room or just wants to add to their furniture they already have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: The set was easy to assemble and looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT TIGHTEN ALL THE SCREWS!! Keep them loose until you’re done, and then tighten
customer_reviews.author: Fanger

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it’s a small perfect set. I read reviews before purchasing. I did not have any issues with assembly and all parts were there. The wicker webbing is made of heavy plastic and is perfect,I live on the coast and needed something that holds up to damp environment. I just bring in cushions at night.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Poorly machined
customer_reviews.text: If you manage to construct it (one screw took me 20 minutes bc of poor hole alignment), is a good set. The glass table is quickly made dirty and shows it, but easy enough to clean. I bought these for my patio, and will be watching to see how well they stand up to heat and rain. For now 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Not a real potato

customer_reviews.title: Really nice once assembled
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were horrible! After it was assembled it was beautiful definitely looks more expensive. Worth the headache of assembling it because it is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: R. M

customer_reviews.title: Great for small apartments!
customer_reviews.text: This took in total about 45 minutes to put together (if that). All the pieces fit perfectly and it is comfortable for the price point. They are a little short, but that is not really an issue for my husband and I since I am 5 feet tall and he is 5'9". It fills our balcony on our apartment perfectly. I think overtime I may replace the cushions for thicker padding and add some throw pillows for decoration, but I do not mind how they look and feel currently. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It took 2 of us to assemble them.
customer_reviews.text: Great patio set. Better quality than I expected. Was a little unhappy that glass was used as the top of the table. The chairs are sturdy and pretty comfortable. For the price, this set is great. I’m glad I bought 2 sets.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Nice look to it, the black on black looks pretty sharp. Bought as a housewarming gift and made my daughter very happy. Sturdy, holding together well. A little bit short, though
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Klopman

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy installation, highly recommend using electric drill.
customer_reviews.text: Product was fairly easy too assemble. The back of the chair was probably the most difficult as it's a really tight fit even with no screws. I HIGHLY recommend having an electric drill for installation. As the Allen key is just not totally helpful for the tight fits. It's doable, but makes the installation much more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Sam K

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. A couple of issues: 2 of the welded nuts were off center and hard to line up. Seat cushions could use some sewn on tie downs to keep them from blowing off the chairs. But for the money and overall quality, I would recommend this outdoor furniture set.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Weatherford Jr

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Screw holes for the table don't match up, unable to finish putting the table together. Chairs were tricky to put together in places. The screw holes don't seem very consistent in placement which makes things tricky. Pretty disappointed about the table as that is a huge reason I bought the set. Update: The company sent me a replacement part free of charge and fixed the issue. Rating adjusted accordingly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Good but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked this set until about a year or so in when it started falling apart. The weaving started to break in various places. from weather. I'm going to guess this isn't built for hotter areas.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Very very tiny.  Elton John said it best "Tiny Dancer"
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little set. more for someone 5'4". A few parts missing, but all in all we will use it somewhere. remember this///You get what you pay for......its OK.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great patio set for the price. It sits a little low. I live in a condo with a long, narrow patio and it fits perfectly. I’m really happy I bought this set.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Meh, they are ok
customer_reviews.text: This took me a little over 2 hours to assemble. Half of the holes lined up, half didn’t. Additionally, it took over 3 weeks for this package to arrive, just an FYI for anyone who would need this to arrive quickly. Overall, I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The set came quickly and was easy to assemble, but some screw holes were manually put there and you can definitely tell. I don't think this is worth the price, but i'm going to use it because it still looks nice. It's just not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect item for my yard. It doesn’t take a lot of space and it was so easy to put together. I didn’t even have to use the instructions. No parts missing and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Perez

product_meta.title: Flamaker 3 Pieces Patio Set Outdoor Wicker Patio Furniture Sets Modern Bistro Set Rattan Chair Conversation Sets with Coffee Table for Yard and Bistro (Black)
feature_bullets: 【Simple & Practical】 Closed armrest and leg design makes the chair simple but modern and no need to worry about the rattan falling off when they are used after a long time.
【Sturdy & Durable】The powder coated steel frame are rust-proof and high-quality hand woven weather-resistant PE wicker won't fade.Each seat supports up to 250 pounds.
【Upgraded Comfort】The wide and deep chairs cushioned by very soft padded seat cushions will make you forget your fatigue and enjoy your leisure time completely.
【Widely Used】The set is simple and stylish,it will be perfect for decorating your yard, poolside, balcony, patio and home.You won't regret buying it.
【Easy to Clean】The cushions feature removable black polyester covers for easy cleaning;Tempered glass on the table adds more convenience to clean if any drinks drops on it.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,802 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
